description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物、当代作家，副国级党和国家领导人。现任中共二十届中央委员、第十四届全国人大常委会副委员长、中国文学艺术界联合会主席。曾任中国作家协会主席。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a contemporary writer, and a deputy state-level leader. She is currently a member of the 20th Central Committee of the CCP, a Vice Chairperson of the 14th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, and the Chairperson of the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles. She previously served as the Chairperson of the China Writers Association.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国文学艺术界联合会

zh-cn: 中国文学艺术界联合会
en: China Federation of Literary and Art Circles

description.zh-cn: 由中国各文艺家协会、各省、自治区、直辖市文学艺术界联合会和全国性的产业文学艺术工作者联合会组成的人民团体。
description.en: A people's organization composed of various Chinese artists' associations, provincial-level federations of literary and art circles, and national industrial literary and art workers' federations.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国文学艺术界联合会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairperson of the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族作家自愿结合的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization voluntarily formed by writers of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代文学家，曾任中国作家协会主席。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, former Chairperson of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，铁凝的中国作家协会主席职务继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor to Tie Ning as Chairperson of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 中国画家，铁凝的父亲。
description.en: Chinese painter, father of Tie Ning.

description.zh-cn: 经济学家，燕京华侨大学校长，铁凝的丈夫。
description.en: Economist, president of Yanjing Huaqiao University, husband of Tie Ning.

description.zh-cn: 位于河北省保定市的中学，铁凝的母校。
description.en: A middle school in Baoding, Hebei Province, and Tie Ning's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的抗议示威活动及随后的武力清场事件。
description.en: Protests and subsequent armed crackdown that took place in Beijing, China in 1989.

nodes.id: 河北省文学艺术界联合会

zh-cn: 河北省文学艺术界联合会
en: Hebei Federation of Literary and Art Circles

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, then General Secretary of the CCP, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 负责管理法国国家博物馆和古迹，在法国和国外推广和保护艺术的政府部门。
description.en: The ministry of the Government of France responsible for national museums and historical monuments, promoting and protecting the arts in France and abroad.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 铁凝在第十四届全国人民代表大会上当选为全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Tie Ning was elected as a Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress at the 14th National People's Congress.

position.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会副委员长
position.en: Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 在赵乐际担任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长期间，铁凝担任副委员长。
description.en: Tie Ning serves as Vice Chairperson while Zhao Leji is the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国文学艺术界联合会

description.zh-cn: 铁凝接替孙家正，担任中国文学艺术界联合会主席。
description.en: Tie Ning succeeded Sun Jiazheng as the Chairperson of the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles.

description.zh-cn: 铁凝接替巴金，担任中国作家协会主席。
description.en: Tie Ning succeeded Ba Jin as the Chairperson of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 张宏森接替铁凝，担任中国作家协会主席。
description.en: Zhang Hongsen is set to succeed Tie Ning as the Chairperson of the China Writers Association.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 铁凝是中共第十六届、十七届中央候补委员，以及第十八届、十九届、二十届中央委员。
description.en: Tie Ning was an alternate member of the 16th and 17th Central Committees, and a full member of the 18th, 19th, and 20th Central Committees of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，时任河北省文联主席的铁凝公开表态支持武力镇压。
description.en: After the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests and massacre, Tie Ning, then Chairperson of the Hebei Federation of Literary and Art Circles, publicly expressed support for the armed suppression.

relationships.target: 河北省文学艺术界联合会

description.zh-cn: 铁凝在1989年时担任河北省文联主席。
description.en: Tie Ning served as the Chairperson of the Hebei Federation of Literary and Art Circles in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 作为国家主席习近平特使，出席墨西哥总统权力交接仪式。
description.en: Served as the special envoy of President Xi Jinping to attend the presidential inauguration ceremony in Mexico.

description.zh-cn: 授予铁凝艺术与文学骑士勋章。
description.en: Awarded Tie Ning the rank of Chevalier of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres.
